 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּנַס‎</span> **verb** ==be angry== (<lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup> ***id.***; Samaritan <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — 

**Pe\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎וּקצַך שַׂגִּיא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ב‎</span> [[Dan.2.12|Dan 2:12]].
